remarks: Inequality for the difference of norms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmf.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
nmf.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
nmmtri.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
nm2dif $p |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) - ( N ` B ) ) <_ ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) ) $.
